conversation.speaker: Teacher
conversation.text: Good practice! What did you learn today?

conversation.speaker: SAGE
conversation.text: Today, I focused on common color associations across cultures, noting cultural similarities and differences between red, blue, green, yellow, purple, black, white, and orange. This exercise allowed us to familiarize ourselves with these associations without being overly sensitive to specific individuals or historical periods. If you need help understanding color symbolism from different cultures or examples of its varied uses, feel free to ask!
